Package boundary

Class ApplicationMain

Object
ApplicationMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationMain
public class ApplicationMain extends Object implements IApplicationMain
Provides the user interface for application-related tasks such as: - Officer: booking flats, generating receipts - Manager: approving/rejecting applications and withdrawals, filtering Implements IApplicationMain.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenuOfficer

      public void displayMenuOfficer(Scanner sc, Officer officer)
      Displays the officer-facing application menu, allowing them to: 1. Book a flat for a successful applicant 2. Generate a receipt for a booking
      Specified by:
      displayMenuOfficer in interface IApplicationMain
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner for user input
      officer - The logged-in officer

    • displayMenuManager

      public void displayMenuManager(Scanner sc, Manager manager)
      Displays the manager-facing application menu, allowing them to: 1. Approve or reject applications 2. Approve or reject withdrawals 3. Filter applications by marital status and flat type
      Specified by:
      displayMenuManager in interface IApplicationMain
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner for user input
      manager - The logged-in manager

    • bookFlat

      private void bookFlat(Scanner sc, Officer officer)
      Books a flat for a successful applicant, selected by NRIC. Verifies officerâ€™s access to project and flat availability.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      officer - Officer booking the flat

    • generateReceipt

      private void generateReceipt(Scanner sc, Officer officer)
      Generates a booking receipt for a selected applicant, if the booking was successful.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for input
      officer - Officer generating the receipt

    • retrieveApplications

      private Map<String,BTOApplication> retrieveApplications(User user)
      Retrieves applications for the currently active project of a manager or officer.
      Parameters:
      user - The manager or officer user
      Returns:
      Map of NRIC to BTOApplication, or null if invalid

    • processApplication

      private void processApplication(Scanner sc, Manager manager, boolean isApproval)
      Allows a manager to approve or reject applications. Only works on applications with status PENDING.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for input
      manager - Manager processing applications
      isApproval - true to approve, false to reject

    • processWithdrawals

      private void processWithdrawals(Scanner sc, Manager manager, boolean isApproval)
      Allows a manager to approve or reject withdrawal requests from applicants.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for input
      manager - Manager processing withdrawals
      isApproval - true to approve, false to reject

    • filterApplication

      private void filterApplication(Scanner sc, Manager manager)
      Allows a manager to filter applications based on marital status and flat type. Results are printed using PrintBTOApplications.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for input
      manager - The manager using the filter feature
